content: I want to thank my partner in this journey, a man who campaigned from his heart, and spoke for the men and women he grew up with on the streets of Scranton, and rode with on the train home to Delaware, the vice president-elect of the United States, Joe Biden.
translations: ita:Io voglio ringraziare il mio compagno in questo viaggio, un uomo che ha fatto campagna elettorale col cuore, e ha parlat
